snippet.title: echo - Gameplay trailer
snippet.description:
Gameplay trailer for puzzle game echo.

Echo is a puzzle game, where a clone reflects all your moves. Your goal is to solve puzzles and find out how to destroy your clone.

Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1992410/echo/
DEMO on itch.io: https://casualstuff.itch.io/echo
